title: Figures on government spending and debt
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Mon, Aug 3, 2015, 21:52 BST - UK Markets closed Figures on government spending and debt Figures on government spending and debt Associated Press – 15 minutes ago 
WASHINGTON (AP) -- Figures on government spending and debt (last six digits are eliminated). The government's fiscal year runs Oct. 1 through Sept. 30. Total public debt subject to limit July 31 18,112,975 Total public debt outstanding July 31 18,151,323 Interest fiscal year 2015 thru June 181,833 Interest same period pvs fiscal year 191,761 Deficit fiscal year 2015 thru June 313,381 Deficit same period pvs fiscal year 365,865 Receipts fiscal year 2015 thru June 2,446,920 Receipts same period pvs fiscal year 2,260,385 Outlays fiscal year 2015 thru June 2,760,301 Outlays same period pvs fiscal year 2,626,250 Follow the quotes you care about most.
